name: Aeon
detailed_description:
Aeon is a VR shooting game for HTC Vive. There is not much stories, we just put a pair of sharp sword on your back, hand over you two heavy caliber pistols, and let you do the kill! And we offer you a super cool bullet time ability, Think of all those bad ass movie which has slow motion, Now you can do the same thing. There is no cool down for bullet time, but when you fire your weapon or move your hands quickly, The time speed will be increased too. In general, the slower you move, the slower time flows, that will make the slow motion has a movie like rhythm! You have to control your body steady, observe enemy's action carefully, make the shot smartly.

Features:

- Now you can see your whole body in a VR game and dance( lol ), our technology will use your headset and controller position to calculate your other body parts movements. We think be able to see your body is very important!

- We put a lot effort on the reactions of enemies when they got hit ,You shot different part of the enemy with different distance, they will react very differently. And we made a very effective real-time cutting system, which allow you to use your swords to cut everything into pieces!

- Fast teleport locomotion with your touchpad! You can teleport to any direction by press your touchpad.

- We dig into all details about the cool physique reactions, the bullet shell will bounce around and you can catch them if you're fast enough, you can turn enemy's rockets back or slash them into pieces, your can use your weapon to block the bullets or cut them, You can hold the shell of a rocket in your arms.


We have open mind for any suggestions and cool ideas of the game, and we're keep working on new contents. Please feel free to send us your ideas and feedbacks in the forum!
